DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best way treat people d4T ( stavudine ) high level lactic acid . Switching d4T abacavir assess . Adding riboflavin thiamine also assess . Participants randomly assign one four group : - Group 1 participant continue take d4T part antiretroviral ( ARV ) regimen , give vitamin supplement - Group 2 continue take d4T without vitamin supplement - Group 3 switch d4T abacavir receive vitamin - Group 4 switch d4T abacavir without vitamin supplement . The study plan involve eighty participant Canada Argentina treatment period 16 week follow-up visit week 24 .
DOC.brief_title: D4T Abacavir Plus Vitamin Enhancement HIV-Infected Patients ( DAVE )
DOC.criteria: Be HIVpositive Be 18 year age old Have viral load equal 50 copies/mL Have d4Tcontaining multiple drug regimen ( least three agent total ) least six month Have stable ARV regimen three month prior enrollment Have venous lactic acid measurement 2.1 mmol/L within three month prior enrollment two consecutive measurement 2.1 low 6.0 within twoweek period screen Be willing discontinue Lcarnitine and/or coenzyme Q10 Be willing able provide inform consent Pregnancy breastfeed Venous lactic acid equal 6.0 mmol/L Previous exposure abacavir Virologic rebound previous regimen consist dual triple nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTIs ) Use hydroxyurea within three month prior enrollment Use metformin Any acute cardiopulmonary illness infection New AIDSdefining illness diagnose within four week enrollment Riboflavin thiamine supplementation 20 mg/day within 30 day prior enrollment
